paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant rs3807370, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: 223 men and 359 women, age range: 18–36 years for men, 18–34 years for women

functional_data.summary: The uncommon alleles were associated with superior performance in social memory tasks.

variants.segregation_data: The association was significant for men only.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for association with social memory performance.
variants.additional_notes: The variant rs3807370 was in strong linkage disequilibrium with rs1800779 in the NOS3 gene.
key_quotes: The uncommon alleles were associated with superior performance, and the effects were present for men only (p < 0.0002).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in KCNH2 was reported in the paper.
